title: Goodbye Galaxie!
content:
I am going to go now...

Goodbye.





Oh you want more information? Well mind you this wasn't my idea. I really didn't want to post this. I don't like "Goodbye" topics. I think they are lame.

Anyway.

I was talking to my brother a few days ago and he said something like "Hey, what about the people you know online? You telling them you are leaving?"

I responded with "Not really... I was just going to leave..."

He said "Well that's MEAN!"

And you know what? It is.
So for what it's worth... here we are. I'm leaving in a week or so... on the 21st of august. Bye. It was a fun... like... year and a half.

'Tever. It's not like I am disappearing or... dead. (yet)


Oh what am I leaving for you ask? (And if you didn't who cares! No one asked you.) [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img]

I'm going to United States Marine Corps bootcamp.

3 months.

Of Pure hell...

I CAN'T WAIT! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img]

-GR out.-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.

content: The doodler is hitting boot camp? Good gravy! And good luck! I look forward to your safe return.

title: Re: Goodbye Galaxie!
content:
1.) They aren't sending any marines there anymore.

No, nor Iran.

Not Syria either.

No, not even israel.

Indeed, the only place in the middle east currently recieving marines is Lebanon. This may or may not be due to the fact that only a third of marines voted for Bush.

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

title: Re: Goodbye Galaxie!
content:
Marines are such hypocrites: Stemper Fedelis - Always Faithful

What about us? You wont be faithful to us? You probly wont get to read this anyway...

Man, we'll sure miss you... and bleegd and his buddy...

I was joking; the Marines are an amazing calling - and yes, I have friends whos dads were marines during desert storm: It's gunna be pure deep-fried hell in the Middle East... but you'll get a good tan, at least the exposed parts. The rest of you will be in your bullet-proof winter coat.

Boot-camp - Its like working out, a lot!

It will be hard, and you'll suffer, but it will probably the greatest time of your life... and you'll be in the best shape of your life. 10 years from now, you miss these years with some of the closest friends you'll ever meet.

And if you enter combat, remember I'm praying for you!

God Bless You, and we hope you return safely!Tough Guys Wear Pink!!!
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/tough_guys_wear_pink.jpg[/img]
